name: LovegardenMeditations
0:
”Alexa, ask lovegarden meditations to play.”
”Alexa, ask lovegarden meditations to search.”
”Alexa, ask lovegarden meditations for help.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lovegarden meditations
des:
Timeless wisdom simplified to transform contemporary life challenges. These 10-20 minute guided meditations increase your emotional, creative, and intuitive intelligence.

Listen to your favorite Lovegarden Meditations with your Alexa device.

- Meditations will be added periodically
- Search meditation by title
- Ask Lovegarden Meditations to "Play Random" or "list meditations". Skip through audio using "Next", "Previous", and "Shuffle" voice commands.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
